resources.string: Programming when i was 8 years old until i went to college looked a lot like this. I thought I was pretty good, had some friends that were a little better at it and they helped me get better and I suspect I motivated them as well. I remember in my first semester in college when the instructor started talking about arrays. I got so excited and upset that I went so long without them that I could hardly stay seated to finish hearing him talk about them. I think once in a while we have moments like that and I enjoy them as often as I can get them.
I\'m blessed with 3 boys, an incredible wife, great in-laws and a really cute dog. The dog is my wife\'s, it just hangs around me. :)

I was born in North Carolina, been all over the world living and working. Spent a little time in the army and went to play in a big sandbox while there. I\'ve worked on Ruby on Rails for a while and had fun with that. Also before that I\'ve worked on developing some smaller applications based off microsoft technologies.
Two of the 3 boys with father.
